Title: Toastify
Description: Toastify adds some missing functionallity to the Spotify client(Windows only). It shows a popup, toast style, dialog on track change and it allows you to use global hot keys for Play/Pause, Next, Previous etc. Toastify is developed using C# and WPF.
HomeWiki:
Toastify
Toastify adds some missing functionallity to the Spotify client(Windows only). It shows a popup, toast style, dialog on track change and it allows you to use global hot keys for Play/Pause, Next, Previous etc. Toastify is developed using C# and WPF.


Welcome to Toastify!

Sporting better album art, more reliable Toasts and the hotkeys that keep you coming back for more Spotify music, this is the best version of Toastify yet - Download Now!
